block.p: FRIEDMAN-Shirley. 78, Died unexpectedly on July 14, 2000 in Westfield, New Jersey. Beloved wife of Charles Friedman for fiftyseven plus years, adored mother of Steven and David Friedman, loving mother-in-law of Pamela Boord, cherished sister of Gloria Winter and proud aunt of Seth and Susan Winter and their children Jesse, Jamie and Max. Shirley never had an unkind word to say about anybody, and persevered through years of increasing physical disability with courage, strength and a never-ending curiousity about life and interest in other people's well-being. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, July 16 at 9:30 AM at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. in Manhattan. Contributions may be made to Masonic Camp Seven, 71 W. 23rd St., NY, NY, 10010, or to Broadway Cares/Equity Fights AIDS, 165 West 46th Street, NY, NY 10036.
